segments.text: Hello ! So you are leaving today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello . Thank you for seeing me off . You actually don't need to bother .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is my pleasure to see you off .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks a lot . I hope to see you again .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks again for everything you have done for me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're welcome . Have a nice trip !
segments.speaker: S1
